General.Name: Ningxia Western Venture Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningxia Western Venture Industrial Co.,Ltd. engages in railway transportation, wine sales, and supply chain business in China. It is involved in railway development, construction, operation, and management; warehousing and logistics; and electromechanical, vehicle maintenance, and other businesses. The company also offers dry red, dry white wine, brandy, and distilled wine. In addition, it provides professional third-party logistics services for large power generation and coal chemical companies. Ningxia Western Venture Industrial Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Yinchuan, China.
General.Address: Block C, No.168, Beijing Middle Road, Yinchuan, China, 750002
